Gets the command name for a given method name.

Declaration
public static string GetCommandNameFor(string methodName, string? description = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string methodName

The name of the method.
string description

An optional description of the command. Defaults to null.
Returns
Type Description
string

The command name for the method, or the method name itself if no command name is found.

LoadCommandNames(string)

Loads command names from a YAML file.

Declaration
public static Dictionary<string, string[]> LoadCommandNames(string aliasesFilePath = "data/aliases.yml")
Parameters
Type Name Description
string aliasesFilePath

The path to the YAML file containing command aliases. Defaults to "data/aliases.yml".
Returns
Type Description
Dictionary<string, string[]>

A dictionary mapping command names to their aliases.
